title: Simply Red - Greatest Video Hits (DVD9)(2008)
description:
Simply Red - Greatest Video Hits (DVD9)(2008)

Simply Red: The Greatest Video Hits is part of a global project to commemorate 25 years of the band. The numbers are impressive Simply Red, 

25-year career the band has sold over 50 million albums and charted more than thirty songs in the top positions of the charts of British success, as 

well as hits in the first position of the U.S. charts. The songs that make up the DVD Simply Red: The Greatest Video Hits can be considered as the 

definitive collection of the biggest hits of the group of twenty-five songs that depict every stage of the band over these 25 years of career. The only 

exception is the music on the DVD Go Now, an unreleased version of Mick Hucknall for the song of the band The Moody Blues, which closes the 

collection as a parting gift should be the last song of the singer with Simply Red Worth checking this last and final mosaic career of one of the 

largest and most famous bands in the world! This is a SUPERB DVD, DON'T MISS IT!
